channel.title: Oxycontin
channel.description:
I just popped an oxy 80.. and I'm pretty fucking nervous. The only other opiates I have done are roxys (1 oxy 30) and i blew 2 oxy 10s.
i drank 2 beers already and im gonna drink 2 more.. I just want to know what to expect. thanks for any helpful response.

item.title: Oxycontin
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“noobie22, post:29, topic:284920”]inb4 oxy was illegal[/quote]Was illegal? It actually is illegal, sonny. Unless you have a prescription to it, of course. And regardless of that I doubt anyone else but you was gonna say that… especially since this thread has no purpose anymore

Read full topic

item.title: Oxycontin
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

i hate to sound like a broken record, but there a better way of curing nausea than smoking weed - do less oxy!

i give up

Read full topic

item.title: Oxycontin
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

ah yeah, once you throw up you feel perfect :P! i’ve only thrown up once from it and that’s because i mixed in so much weed and oxy lol

Read full topic

item.title: Oxycontin
item.dc:creator: @pko pko
item.description:
@pko wrote:

the nausea was a 10 second thing. I threw up, and felt 100% fine afterwards. i smoked a shitload of dro throughout the time which fucked me up. it’s done now, and i supposed I should have listened to you, but I wasnt doing this for any reason besides to be able to say I have tried oxycontin and know what it is like.

Read full topic

item.title: Oxycontin
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

Ha, exactly what you were aiming for eh. Shoulda listened to me.

[quote=“pko, post:17, topic:284920”]-simply not cost effective… for 15 bucks I could have bought alot of other shit that would have worked better.[/quote]Hmm… now you’re bitching about money.

I mean, even with your desired idiocy of drinking while taking opiates, snorting 1/4th of it and drinking a bit might have given you the effect you wished for.

tip: to calm the nausea/puking/etc smoke some weed with it, it WILL help.

Read full topic

item.title: Oxycontin
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

oh i reread it, that makes a bit mroe sense, as theyre time release
still

Read full topic

item.title: Oxycontin
item.dc:creator: @pko pko
item.description:
@pko wrote:

i weigh 280 lbs. and it warms my heart that you care.

btw deflated epeen, i did puke. when I woke up, i was still fucked up, and I took another quarter a friend gave to me for free. after about an hour, terrible vomiting. literally exploded while I was smokin a blunt on my bed with some friends. and no, no snorting.

Read full topic

item.title: Oxycontin
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

my dangerous waters comment wasnt really because its oxy, it was the dose 80mg is a pretty fucking hefty dose for the opiate naive, especially with alcohol… you must have been pretty close to od at some point is all im saying (or you have one hell of a natual tolerance :/)

Read full topic

item.title: Oxycontin
item.dc:creator: @pko pko
item.description:
@pko wrote:

Listen, I have done drugs. This is my first experiment in strictly opioids. now I can say from experience, oxys are bad. i know what it is like, and do not want to do it again.

Read full topic

item.title: Oxycontin
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

pko:

-the first 8 hours are very intense… a weird feeling where you zone out and feel tired, then the next second you are awake.

Dude you are seriously getting close to dangerous waters, if you’re not in them already. But whatever you don’t seem bothered, I won’t be surprised when you stop posting though.

Everyone thinks they’re on top of this shit

EDIT: Though at the risk of inflating your epeen, i am impressed you didnt puke Did you snort it all at once or over the course of a night?

Read full topic

item.title: Oxycontin
item.dc:creator: @pko pko
item.description:
@pko wrote:

the oxy 10s were extended release.

and the reason why you should do oxy 80s is because:

-first couple times they will last you up to 16 hours
-the first 8 hours are very intense… a weird feeling where you zone out and feel tired, then the next second you are awake.
-terribly itchy, felt like a heroine addict.
-simply not cost effective… for 15 bucks I could have bought alot of other shit that would have worked better.

Read full topic

item.title: Oxycontin
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“pko, post:15, topic:284920”]if I knew what ER meant,

they worked for less than an hour… it was a mild-relaxation zoned out type feeling.

report on the 80:

don’t do oxy 80s[/quote]ER is extended release… sorry for the acronyms lol.

But why? I’ve never done a full 80 because my tolerance is really low (I weigh 150lbs btw, but that’s irrelevant when snorting)

Read full topic

item.title: Oxycontin
item.dc:creator: @pko pko
item.description:
@pko wrote:

if I knew what ER meant,

they worked for less than an hour… it was a mild-relaxation zoned out type feeling.

report on the 80:

don’t do oxy 80s

item.title: Oxycontin
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“pko, post:13, topic:284920”]oxy 80s are generally 35-40 dollars. i’ve snorted oxycontin before and I dont like the feeling it gives you. drinking with it intensifies the effects, which was what I aimed for. plus im fat (280 lbs). sorry Uriko, I don’t know what its like to be poor like you, so I spend my money on what I want[/quote]Actually in some places in the states an 80 is around ~$80 so I would consider that expensive to even someone as “high status” of yourself, I was of course assuming that it might have been that expensive in your area.

When you snorted the 2 oxy 10s were they ER?

Read full topic

item.title: Oxycontin
item.dc:creator: @pko pko
item.description:
@pko wrote:

oxy 80s are generally 35-40 dollars. i’ve snorted oxycontin before and I dont like the feeling it gives you. drinking with it intensifies the effects, which was what I aimed for. plus im fat (280 lbs). sorry Uriko, I don’t know what its like to be poor like you, so I spend my money on what I want

Read full topic

You prolly coulda snorted 1/4 of that pill and coulda been pretty good… And you’re a retard for drinking with it imo

item.description:
@jme wrote:

enough drug threads, holy shit

theres a thread called “Drugs?” as well as many other general drug discussion threads. I suggest you use that thread to talk about them so that we don’t have several active drug threads in the main catagories all the time.
